CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Join Group or Community stage positioned above or below the Like or Comment stage?
SRP.A: The Join Group or Community stage is positioned {below} the Like or Comment stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Like or Comment?
VE.A: The value of stage Like or Comment is {241}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {194}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Follow Account?
VE.A: The value of stage Follow Account is {146}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Like or Comment, with a value of {241}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Content Creation or Upload, with a value of {52}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Like or Comment to stage Share Content?
SC.A: Decreased by {47} Million Users from stage Like or Comment to stage Share Content.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload?
SC.A: Decreased by {46} Million Users from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {48} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 217? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 75? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {52}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 75 and 217? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Share Content} stage has {194}, the {Follow Account} stage has {146}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {98}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Like or Comment to Share Content?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to {Share Content} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Like or Comment to Share Content?
NC.A: The reductions from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account}, {Follow Account} to {Join Group or Community}, and {Like or Comment} to {Share Content} are equal.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Share Content} and {Follow Account} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Join Group or Community} and {Content Creation or Upload} stages.
